articles.author: Emma Graney
articles.title: War on Ukraine must come with 'ruinous costs' for Russia, Trudeau tells European Parliament - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Trudeau’s address to the European Parliament launched two days of meetings in Belgium for the Prime Minister as the conflict in Europe drags into its second month
articles.content:
People walk past a school which has been destroyed in a Russian air strike in Kharkiv on March 23, 2022.SERGEY BOBOK/AFP/Getty Images

articles.author: Daniel Michaels, Isabel Coles and Georgi Kantchev
articles.title: NATO Estimates Steep Russian Losses in Ukraine as Biden Heads to Europe - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Alliance officials say Russia may have lost as much as one-fifth of its combat forces in about a month of fighting in Ukraine, and alliance leaders are gathering for a summit in Brussels to discuss further support to Kyiv.
articles.content: NATO estimates Russia may have lost as much as one-fifth of its combat forces in about a month of fighting in Ukraine as President Biden and alliance leaders gather in Brussels for a summit to discus… [+378 chars]

articles.title: Putin wants 'unfriendly' countries to pay for Russian gas in roubles - Reuters.com
articles.description: Russia will seek payment in roubles for gas sales from "unfriendly" countries, President Vladimir Putin said on Wednesday, sending European gas prices soaring on concerns the move would exacerbate the region's energy crunch.
articles.content: LONDON, March 23 (Reuters) - Russia will seek payment in roubles for gas sales from "unfriendly" countries, President Vladimir Putin said on Wednesday, sending European gas prices soaring on concerns… [+6047 chars]

articles.title: Omicron subvariant now accounts for over half of all COVID-19 cases in New England, CDC says - The Boston Globe
articles.description: The Omicron subvariant BA.2, which is believed to be one of the drivers of a COVID-19 resurgence in Europe, now accounts for more than half of all new cases of COVID-19 in New England, according to estimates from the CDC.
